frost_potion.description: Restores 25 health and increases frost resistance by 10 for a short duration.

ice_shard.description: A sharp shard of ice that increases attack power by 5 when equipped.

glacial_heart.description: A rare artifact that fully restores health and significantly boosts energy.

snowflake_charm.description: A delicate charm that increases movement speed by 2.

polar_boots.description: Sturdy boots that provide additional speed and frost resistance.

aurora_orb.description: An orb radiating with aurora energy, enhancing magical abilities.

blizzard_scroll.description: A scroll that, when read, summons a powerful blizzard to damage enemies.

frozen_fish.description: A frozen fish that can be consumed for a small health boost.

arctic_feather.description: A feather from an arctic bird, enhancing agility when carried.

crystalized_snowglobe.description: A snowglobe containing a magical crystal that provides defense against magical attacks.
